did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This collection consists of one item.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Joseph Camp Griffith Kennedy Collection, Accession #7201, Clifton Waller Barrett Library, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased by the Library from Clifton Waller Barrett on February 25, 1963.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In a letter, January 18, 1861, Kennedy writes from the United States Census Office, Washington, D. C. to Edward Jarvis, apologizing for his failure to reply to a letter due to the pressure of his census office work, and acknowledging receipt of some unidentified proceedings.
